Plot: Brooke Beckman is a psychiatrist that communicates with ghosts. Since they won't leave her alone, she decided to open up a practice for them. Now she is the only one the ghosts through out history trust with their problems.
Title: Brooke Beckman: Haunted MD
Writer: Sara Blindauer (story), Nicholas Rose (story), Nicholas Rose
Actors: Sara Blindauer, Jonathan Cahill, Mitchel Evans, Michael James Faradie
